product_name: Moving Comfort Fiona Sports Bra - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Moving Comfort Fiona sports bra features shoulder straps that adjust in front and an adjustable back closure to give you a customized fit for high-impact activities such as soccer and running. DryLayer(R) fabric is engineered to transfer moisture from your skin to the outside of the fabric where it quickly disperses and evaporates. Compression exterior offers support while interior molded cups provide encapsulation shape and support. Straps are stabilized for added support and lined with soft fabric for comfort; front adjustments allow an easy, custom fit. 3 rows of hooks and eyes with 3 adjustment positions provide enhanced support and a personalized fit. Plush-backed bottom band ensures firm support. Proportions and contours of neck and armholes on the Moving Comfort Fiona sports are designed to reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: The Moving Comfort Fiona sports bra features shoulder straps that adjust in front and an adjustable back closure to give you a customized fit for high-impact activities such as soccer and running.
